mapper.select: SELECT hos.hpt_name, geo.adrs_new FROM hospital AS hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo AS geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id LIMIT 0,30

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, hos.hpt_hit, hos.hpt_phone, geo.adrs_new, geo.adrs_old, IFNULL (NULLIF(geo.adrs_new,''), geo.adrs_old) address, avg(rv.hpt_rate) rate_avg, count(rv.rv_id) review_cnt FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv ON hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id GROUP BY hos.hpt_id HAVING hos.hpt_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{hpt_name},'%') ORDER BY hos.hpt_name ASC

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, hos.hpt_hit, hos.hpt_phone, geo.adrs_new, geo.adrs_old, IFNULL (NULLIF(geo.adrs_new,''), geo.adrs_old) address, avg(rv.hpt_rate) rate_avg, count(rv.hpt_rate) review_cnt FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv on hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id WHERE geo.province=#{province} AND geo.city=#{city} GROUP BY hos.hpt_id ORDER BY hos.hpt_name ASC

SELECT hos.hpt_id, hos.hpt_name, hos.hpt_hit, hos.hpt_phone, geo.adrs_new, geo.adrs_old, avg(rv.hpt_rate) rate_avg, count(rv.hpt_rate) review_cnt FROM hospital as hos INNER JOIN hospital_geo as geo ON hos.hpt_id = geo.hpt_id INNER JOIN review as rv on hos.hpt_id = rv.hpt_id WHERE hos.hpt_id = #{hpt_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE hospital SET hpt_hit = hpt_hit + 1 WHERE hpt_id = #{hpt_id}
